RLG.EnableLootPreview.Name: Enable Loot Preview
RLG.EnableLootPreview.Hint: If enabled, a preview window appears with options that let you accept or reroll the items.
RLG.EnableAutoLoot.Name: Enable Auto-Loot on Token Drop
RLG.EnableAutoLoot.Hint: If enabled, random loot will automatically be assigned to NPC tokens when they are dragged onto the canvas.
RLG.RandomQuantityFormula.Name: Random Item Quantity
RLG.RandomQuantityFormula.Hint: Enter a dice formula (such as 1d4 or 1d3+12) or a static number (e.g., 5) to determine the default number of items generated.
RLG.MaxRarity.Name: Maximum Loot Rarity
RLG.MaxRarity.Hint: Choose the default maximum level of rarity that you want to generate. Choose a lower rarity for lower CR games and low-magic worlds.
RLG.SelectedCompendiums.Name: Select Loot Sources
RLG.SelectedCompendiums.Hint: Choose which default sources to pull loot from (compendiums, folders, or roll tables).
RLG.UseCRBasedCurrency.Name: Use CR-Based Currency
RLG.UseCRBasedCurrency.Hint: Scale the currency by creature Challenge Rating (CR) instead of using a fixed formula.
RLG.DefaultCurrencyChance.Name: Default Currency Chance
RLG.DefaultCurrencyChance.Hint: Set the global percentage chance for creatures to get extra currency (0-100%).
RLG.CurrencyFormula.Name: Currency Formula
RLG.CurrencyFormula.Hint: Set a custom dice formula for generating currency (e.g., '1d10' for gold base amount). This feature is off if you use the CR-based currency option.
RLG.SelectedFolders.Name: Default Loot Folders
RLG.SelectedFolders.Hint: Choose world folders to pull items from.
RLG.CreatureTypeLoot.Name: Creature Type Loot
RLG.CreatureTypeLoot.Hint: Assign specific loot compendiums and folders to different creature types.
RLG.LootTables.Name: Loot Tables
RLG.LootTables.Hint: Selected RollTables for creature type loot overrides.
RLG.CreatureTypeLootMenu.Name: Manage Creature Type Loot
RLG.CreatureTypeLootMenu.Label: Configure
RLG.CreatureTypeLootMenu.Hint: Override the default settings by selecting different compendiums and folders for different creature types.
RLG.RarityPercentages.Name: Rarity Percentages
RLG.RarityPercentagesMenu.Name: Manage Rarity Percentages
RLG.RarityPercentagesMenu.Label: Edit Percentages
RLG.RarityPercentagesMenu.Hint: Adjust the percentage chance for each rarity level.
